p: Total RNA was extracted from cells using Trizol reagent ( Invitrogen), treated with Turbo RNase-free DNase ( Ambion, TX), and processed as described. 23 The cDNA was synthesized with a superscript first-strand synthesis system ( Invitrogen). Real-time RT-PCR was performed using Taq DNA polymerase with the SYBR green Universal PCR Master Mix Protocol (Perkin Elmer Applied Biosystems, Foster City, CA). Quantitation was performed using the Comparative Cycle Threshold (Î”C T) method using GAPDH housekeeping gene as standard. 29
